## Summary

- Added a red armband (2 pixels wide) to both player arm sprites (`player_left_arm.png` and `player_right_arm.png`)
- The red color contrasts well with the green uniform and blue-tinted "last chance" effect
- Updated `player_combined_preview.png` to reflect the new look
- Created `experiments/add_armband.py` script for reproducible sprite modification

## Visual Changes

The armband uses three shades of red for proper shading:
- Dark red (140, 30, 30) for shadows
- Main red (180, 40, 40) for the base color  
- Light red (210, 60, 60) for highlights

The armband is placed at x=10-11 on the arm sprites, making it visible on the forearm area during gameplay.

## Fixes
Closes #234

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify the red armband is visible on the player during normal gameplay
- [ ] Verify the player stands out during the "last chance" blue-tinted effect
- [ ] Confirm the armband color is red (not orange) as requested
